basics.name: Tim Jacobs
basics.label: Staff Software Engineer
summary: Staff Software Engineer specializing in large-scale backend architecture, data engineering, and high-impact DevOps transformation. Proven ability to drive technical roadmaps, mentor engineers, and deliver pragmatic, quality-focused solutions that optimize value streams and enable data-driven strategy across organizations.
Lead engineer for ingestion pipelines, metadata systems, and cross-partner data integrations supporting analytics and modeling.
highlights: Architected ingestion and metadata pipelines powering multi-product data workflows and identity resolution.
Implemented Snowflake and dbt models supporting high-volume analytics and large-scale backfills.
Delivered S2S and pixel integrations across multiple partners with clear ingestion specs, QA workflows, and verification tooling.
Led privacy automation for deletion, retention, and de-identification workflows across production environments.
Improved system reliability via observability, CI/linting, data quality enforcement, and operational tooling.
Provided cross-team leadership in design reviews, debugging, and technical decision-making.

summary: Staff engineer improving reliability and delivery pipelines for a distributed microservices-based insurance platform.
highlights: Designed test and automation architecture for complex event-driven billing and policy systems.
Delivered continuous delivery tooling improving deployment velocity and failure recovery.
Built shared platform components accelerating delivery for multiple teams across engineering.

summary: Led test architecture, data workflows, and reference data system re-architecture enabling faster deployment cycles.
Product Owner and DevOps contributor improving CI systems, test frameworks, and team execution for large-scale storage software.
Led SSD validation engineering supporting Tier 1 OEM products with responsibility for quality, debug, and team leadership.
Led validation, automation, and data-driven analysis improving firmware and hardware test efficiency for OEM storage products.
Developed automated workflow and document-generation systems supporting engineering and field operations.
Failure analysis lead supporting development-to-production transitions for mobile hard drive platforms.
